sn20.9:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
sn20.9:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena annataro navo bhikkhu ativelam kulani upasankamati.
sn20.9:1.7: “ime hi nama thera bhikkhu kulani upasankamitabbam mannissanti, kimangam panahan”ti?
sn20.9:2.1: Atha kho sambahula bhikkhu yena bhagava tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidimsu. Ekamantam nisinna kho te bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavocum:
sn20.9:2.2: “idha, bhante, annataro navo bhikkhu ativelam kulani upasankamati.
sn20.9:2.6: ‘ime hi nama thera bhikkhu kulani upasankamitabbam mannissanti, kimangam panahan’”ti.
sn20.9:3.3: Te tam sarasim ogahetva sondaya bhisamulalam abbuhetva suvikkhalitam vikkhaletva akaddamam sankhaditva ajjhoharanti.
sn20.9:3.4: Tesam tam vannaya ceva hoti balaya ca, na ca tatonidanam maranam va nigacchanti maranamattam va dukkham.
sn20.9:3.5: Tesamyeva kho pana, bhikkhave, mahanaganam anusikkhamana taruna bhinkacchapa tam sarasim ogahetva sondaya bhisamulalam abbuhetva na suvikkhalitam vikkhaletva sakaddamam asankhaditva ajjhoharanti.
sn20.9:3.6: Tesam tam neva vannaya hoti na balaya.
sn20.9:3.7: Tatonidanam maranam va nigacchanti maranamattam va dukkham.
sn20.9:4.1: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, idha thera bhikkhu pubbanhasamayam nivasetva pattacivaramadaya gamam va nigamam va pindaya pavisanti.
sn20.9:4.4: Te tam labham agadhita amucchita anajjhopanna adinavadassavino nissaranapanna paribhunjanti.
sn20.9:4.5: Tesam tam vannaya ceva hoti balaya ca, na ca tatonidanam maranam va nigacchanti maranamattam va dukkham.
sn20.9:4.6: Tesamyeva kho pana, bhikkhave, theranam bhikkhunam anusikkhamana nava bhikkhu pubbanhasamayam nivasetva pattacivaramadaya gamam va nigamam va pindaya pavisanti.
sn20.9:4.9: Te tam labham gadhita mucchita ajjhopanna anadinavadassavino anissaranapanna paribhunjanti.
sn20.9:4.10: Tesam tam neva vannaya hoti na balaya, te tatonidanam maranam va nigacchanti maranamattam va dukkham.
sn20.9:4.12: ‘agadhita amucchita anajjhopanna adinavadassavino nissaranapanna tam labham paribhunjissama’ti.
